entry.Diamond: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
entry.Pearl: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
entry.Platinum: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.
entry.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It covers itself with a cloak to shelter from the cold. When it’s hot, its cloak is thinner.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.
entry.XOmega Ruby: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
entry.YAlpha Sapphire: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

DiamondPearlPlatinum: Route 205, 206, 207, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215, 218, 221, 222, Eterna Forest, Floaroma Meadow, Fuego Ironworks, Valley Windworks
